last_episode_to_air.name: Chapter Sixteen
last_episode_to_air.overview: Noa uncovers a devastating truth. Solomon learns of an old enemy's fate. Sunja must decide between her past and her future.

name: Pachinko
overview: Follow the hopes and dreams of four generations of a Korean immigrant family beginning with a forbidden love and crescendos into a sweeping saga that journeys between Korea, Japan and America to tell the unforgettable story of war and peace, love and loss, triumph and reckoning.

seasons.name: Season 2
seasons.overview: In season two, parallel stories pick up in Osaka in 1945, where Sunja is forced to make dangerous decisions for her family’s survival during World War II, and in Tokyo in 1989, where Solomon explores new, humble beginnings.

tagline: Within us all lies the courage to change our destiny.

episodes.name: Chapter One
episodes.overview: In 1920s Korea, Yangjin and Kim Hoonie shield their only child, Kim Sunja, from the realities of life under colonial rule. In 1989, Solomon Baek closes a big deal.

episodes.name: Chapter Two
episodes.overview: Hansu opens Sunja's eyes to the world, but it inspires dreams that come at a price. Solomon attempts to leverage his Korean identity.

episodes.name: Chapter Three
episodes.overview: Sunja discovers surprising new details about Hansu. Solomon looks to his grandmother for help.

episodes.name: Chapter Four
episodes.overview: Newlywed Sunja embarks on an epic journey that takes her far from the comforts of home. Solomon gets ready for his big day.

episodes.name: Chapter Five
episodes.overview: As she arrives in Japan with her husband, Sunja must depend on the help of others. Solomon copes with the aftermath of his deal.

episodes.name: Chapter Six
episodes.overview: Sunja goes into premature labor while Baek Isak grapples with a political awakening. Solomon finds Hana, his long-lost love.

episodes.name: Chapter Seven
episodes.overview: As a young man in 1923 Yokohama, Hansu is thrown into a cataclysmic disaster that will change everything.

episodes.name: Chapter Eight
episodes.overview: Sunja learns that Isak has been arrested and searches for him with the aid of her young son. Solomon makes a fateful decision.

episodes.name: Chapter Nine
episodes.overview: World War II forces Sunja to make dangerous decisions for her family's survival. Pushed to the edge, Solomon takes a stand.

episodes.name: Chapter Ten
episodes.overview: The family reunites with a loved one and confronts a harsh reality. Solomon makes a discovery that could prove beneficial.

episodes.name: Chapter Eleven
episodes.overview: Sunja and the children flee Osaka only to find their new location has its own challenges. Solomon's past leads him to new beginnings.

episodes.name: Chapter Twelve
episodes.overview: As new relationships blossom, a tragedy threatens to destroy everything. Sunja meets a close friend of Solomon's.

episodes.name: Chapter Thirteen
episodes.overview: The family's fight for survival begins anew as WWII reaches the home front. A surprise figure thwarts Solomon's perfect plan.

episodes.name: Chapter Fourteen
episodes.overview: Five years after the war has ended, Hansu is at the top of the criminal underworld—but his riches come at a great price.

episodes.name: Chapter Fifteen
episodes.overview: Mr. Kim faces a difficult choice: the woman he loves or his homeland. Both Solomon and Mozasu execute ruthless plans.

episodes.name: Chapter Sixteen
episodes.overview: Noa uncovers a devastating truth. Solomon learns of an old enemy's fate. Sunja must decide between her past and her future.

2.name: Season 2
2.overview: In season two, parallel stories pick up in Osaka in 1945, where Sunja is forced to make dangerous decisions for her family’s survival during World War II, and in Tokyo in 1989, where Solomon explores new, humble beginnings.
